reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, with one noting its subtle sparkles throughout, and appreciate its perfect fit, comfort, and flattering cut.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful
items.body: This dress was fantastic. It had a lot of stretch and was very flattering on my plus size teen with the little sleeves. Sparkle was pretty and fit was great. My daughter did mention that it was a little scratchy under the arms but not too bad. Would order this in multiple colors. She wears a 16/XL and this fit true to size. Read more
items.author: vpjc9304

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Middle school dance appropriate
items.body: Fit my 13 year old daughter well! We got the smallest size and it was a little loose on her thin frame but it still looks very nice and is perfect for the school dance. I was a little concerned it would be too short to be appropriate for a school dance but it was fingertip length. I was also concerned about it being too shear (see through) but there are 3 layers of fabric so it was all good. Would definitely recommend and might purchase again in another color. Read more
items.author: Michella

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sparkly
items.body: Pretty but runs a bit wide and short Read more
items.author: MammaC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a teenager
items.body: I bout6this for my 15 year old daughter for a family photoshoot, and she loved it. The quality is nice, and it fit her perfectly. It was also age appropriate. Very satisfied customer. Read more
items.author: Meech

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lucky Birthday dress!
items.body: The media could not be loaded. I got this dress for my 27th birthday. I paired this pretty red sparkly dress with some playing card earrings, black choker with a red heart, and a red sparkly purse with gold lining. The accessories were super easy to find and go with the color of the dress since it is exactly as pictured. When the dress is in the sun it can become brighter, but not see through! I've added some pictures to show the difference in lighting, black and white, and the video is taken in a dark room with only my phone's flash on and zero filter. I got this dress in Red, Size XL I'm normally a size 14 - 16 US depending on the dress, 38,33,40 are my measurements and this is a true XL. I'm six feet and half an inch tall and as you can see, the dress reaches a couple inches past my fingertips. I have a considerable amount of medical issues to put it short, I can't stand long or much at all without falling so I had to pick a dress that wouldn't go up too high in my wheelchair. If you're wheelchair user, or plan to be seated most of the time in this dress, you may want to get a shawl or matching lace cardigan/kimono for modesty to cover up any spots that may come up too high. The weight of this dress is absolutely perfect not too heavy or light enough to pick up breeze. The fabric itself on the outside is almost chiffon like, there's a thin layer of under tulle that's matching and gives it a nice bounce in movement or still pictures. Inside the the dress feels like one of those Ghost Face costumes, not exactly expensive quality but perfectly warm and actually surprisingly comfortable on the skin all day. I had some issues with the zipper in the beginning getting it to come down and back up without even trying the dress on but after a couple of times and then actually putting it on while trying to zip it up it was pretty easy. The spaghetti straps are pretty thin and I can see one thread on both sides that may just be too long. The sparkles don't drop much and the dress washes well by hand, I think you could even put it in a washing machine in a pillowcase turned inside out and it'll be okay. I got so many compliments on my birthday I can't even count, every time I wear this dress I get complimented! If you're still thinking about getting this dress I definitely recommend! Read more
items.author: Christina Furby

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap fabric
items.body: Beautiful but very cheap material … returning it!!! Read more
items.author: NYFashioner27

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute but itchy
items.body: It is a cute dress and it fits true to size. It is very itchy though so I was uncomfortable the whole time I was wearing it. Read more
items.author: Ashley Hines

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Christmas dress
items.body: Just got this today. Fits good. It is so cute. Size was good Read more
items.author: Rebecca

short_description:
Womens Dress Off Shoulder Cocktail Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress Off Shoulder Cocktail Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A-white, A-dark Green, A-hot Pink, A-black, A-burgundy, Burgundy, Grey Blue, Hot Pink, Black, Dark Green, Red, Navy, Lavender, Pink. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
